scripts.build:dev: bun run db:generate && bun run check && bun build src/index.ts --outdir=build/dev --target=bun --sourcemap --external 'node_modules/*'
scripts.build:staging: bun run db:generate && bun run check && bun run lint && bun build src/index.ts --outdir=build/staging --target=bun --sourcemap
scripts.build:prod: bun run db:generate && bun run check && bun run lint && bun run format && bun build src/index.ts --outdir=build/prod --target=bun --minify --external 'node_modules/*'
scripts.build:analyze: bun run build:prod && bun --print "Build size analysis for production"
scripts.pre-commit: bun run typecheck && bun run lint:check && bun run format:check && bun test tests/smoke.test.ts
